choices.A: Create LGPO and assign to Windows devices.
choices.D: Create Application Control profile and assign to Windows devices.
choices.B: Create sensors and assign to Windows devices.
choices.C: Create an OEM update profile and assign to Windows devices.

questions.question_text:
An administrator would like to track these details for all Windows desktops managed by Workspace ONE UEM:
✑ driver details for a mouse driver
✑ warranty information for OS
✑ registry value of internal apps
Which Workspace ONE UEM utility can the administrator use?

discussion.content: Sensors can execute a PowerShell command and capture these details

choices.C: In the Workspace ONE UEM console > Identity & Access Management tab > select Setup then Custom Branding.
choices.D: In the Workspace ONE Access console > Identity & Access Management tab > select Setup then Custom Branding.
choices.B: In the Workspace ONE Access console > Setup, Identity & Access Management tab > select Custom Branding.
choices.A: In the Workspace ONE UEM console > Configurations, Identity & Access Management tab > select Setup then Custom Branding.

questions.question_text:
An administrator of a Workspace ONE Access tenant would like to add the company’s logo and standard color scheme to their tenant.

Where would the administrator accomplish this task?

discussion.content:
"D" on older ones and here is how on new one:

Selected Answer: AB
Correct Answer: AB

questions.question_text: Which two solutions are linked together when Hub Services is activated for the first time? (Choose two.)
Which component can use an AirWatch generated certificate for Inbound SSL Traffic?

discussion.content:
"D"
"Verify (Intelligent Hub) is a multi-factor (MFA) authentication method integrated with the Workspace ONE Intelligent Hub app. Users will receive a push notification request to the Intelligent Hub app on their managed or registered device to approve their login."

questions.question_text: Which VMware feature in the Intelligent Hub provides the ability for administrators to leverage Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)?
